description:
Application Petit Futé "Berlin-TouchPad"

Petit Futé offers interactive applications in foreign cities, always with the same currency:

" Les bonnes adresses du bout de la rue au bout du monde ! ".

This is an application OFF LINE (Embedded) that don’t require a constant Internet connection to function properly. Every time somefeatures may require an internet connection.

The city is offered with several thousands of addresses spread over several categories:

- All tips
- Accommodation
- Restaurant
- Visit
- Going out
- Shopping
- Activities
- Beauty, Wellness
- House, home decor, garden
- Celebrations, events
- Information
- Food

features:

- Contents of the guide to learn more about the destination
- Search by categories or dynamic search in the city
- Addresses presented width Petit Futé advices, useful information, contacts, reviews, photo slideshow or send him an email.
- Location of addresses on a map with the possibility to locate you if you are connected.
- Function "just type" to search directly from the TouchPad without passing directly through the application

Petit Futé website: www.petitfute.com
